attributes.action: Swansea Bay Tidal Lagoon project needs full Government commitment
attributes.additional_details:
Project website: http://www.tidallagoonswanseabay.com/
Climate change science: http://www.skepticalscience.com/
attributes.background: This would be an iconic project, a world first. It would make the UK a world leader in tidal energy. David Cameron has recently said that his enthusiasm for the project has 'reduced.' The Cameron Government have already undermined wind and solar power. Let's make sure they don't destroy tidal power.
